topics.learning_outcomes: Listen to grade level stories. Retell stories creatively. Tell stories creatively.

subtopics: Ask relevant questions to get better understanding and knowledge
topics.learning_outcomes: Use complete sentences to communicate information. Ask relevant questions to get better understanding and knowledge. Take part in discussions. Participate in simple debates.
Give physical descriptions of people. Give descriptions of places. Give descriptions of objects.
Say and respond to riddles. Recite tongue twisters.
Read aloud syllables formed by three or more consonant clusters. Read words of increasing number of syllables. Read texts of 5-7 sentences fluently. Read own writing fluently.
Identify synonyms. Identify antonyms. Form plural and singular nouns.
Identify proper nouns. Identify common nouns.

subtopics: Identify the main idea in a story
Recall order of events in a text
topics.learning_outcomes: Draw inferences from the information they have heard. Deduce the meaning of unfamiliar grade level words. Express the main idea of the information they have listened to. Link their own life experiences to what they listen to. Summarise stories. Provide explicitly stated information in a given grade level text. Identify the main idea in a story. Recall order of events in a text. Make predictions based on given information. Draw inferences from written material. Link their own life experiences to what they have read.
Write words of increasing number of syllables legibly in manuscript form. Write sentences in manuscript form.

Communicate ideas through drawing. Use the main punctuation marks (capital letters, full stop, comma and question mark). Write complete sentences. Compose and write a short fiction story of 3 to 4 sentences. Compose and write a short exposition.
